title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2430.4 - Hours of public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2430.4 - Hours of public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and
records shall be available for public inspection on all regular business days
during the hours 9 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2430.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
